short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A crisp and minimal New Tab with weather widget, Yahoo search, and a clock.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crisp Home is a well organized Home New Tab.

Weather Widget 
Stay updated with real-time weather information tailored to your specific location. Whether it's sunny, raining, or snowing, you'll always be prepared.

Clock
Keep track of time effortlessly with our elegant and minimalist clock, ensuring you're always on schedule.

Search Bar
Quickly find what you need with our integrated search bar powered by Yahoo, designed to streamline your internet searches directly from your new tab.
